scm-branchwp-plugin.enableHelpText: If enabled, nobody can write to the repository expect administrators, repository owners and the specified rules.

form.branchHelpText: Enter a branch name or a pattern like feature/* {mail}/* {username}/feature* {mail} and {username} would be replaced with the user mail and username.

table.name: User or group
table.nameHelpText: Manage permissions for a specific user or group.

confirmDeleteAlert.title: Delete Branch Permission
confirmDeleteAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the Branch Permission?

scm-branchwp-plugin.obstacle: You do not have permissions to modify the target branch.

*.description: May modify repository specific branch permissions
